summary: Walshe said his wife left town for a work emergency in January 2023. Investigators found items like a hacksaw, bloody rugs and her COVID vaccine card in dumpsters — and chilling searches on his devices.

title: ACA shoppers face sticker shock as Congress dithers on health care
summary: With subsidies that help consumers pay their health insurance premiums set to expire, health care shoppers face staggering prices. Lawmakers are running out of time to agree on a solution.

title: Roomba maker files for bankruptcy, weighed down by debt and tariffs
summary: iRobot, the U.S. firm that had robots vacuuming homes, will be taken over by its China-based supplier. It's assuring owners that devices will keep working as usual.

title: Trump says Rob Reiner had 'Trump Derangement Syndrome' in post on his death
summary: Officials are investigating the death of the Hollywood director as a homicide.

title: England enter the point of no return for Ashes hopes
summary: Pat Cummins returns to captain Australia who are on the brink of securing the series before Christmas

title: Khawaja left out of Adelaide, Cummins and Lyon return
summary: Josh Inglis has kept his spot in the middle order for the third Test while Pat Cummins and Nathan Lyon return

title: IPL 2026 to be held between March 26 and May 31
summary: The IPL will kick off roughly three weeks after the T20 World Cup, and clash with the PSL
